entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
